attributes.comment: I believe this could be a very good idea but discovering a successful way to put it into action will be extremely challenging. I think it would be very difficult having medical workers report whatever information would be needed on top of all of the other paperwork and patient care they are responsible for in the field already. It would be nice to have a database to research and choose a professional, but the likelihood of this being successful in a big community seems unlikely unless there was a method that would be quick and efficient for medical professionals.

attributes.title: Comment on CMS-2022-0163-0001
